items.title: Hegseth says return to Ukraine's 2014 borders 'unrealistic'
items.description: In a stark warning to Kyiv, the US defence secretary also says he does not envision Ukraine joining Nato.

items.title: Sudan fighters accused of storming famine-hit camp
items.description: Paramilitaries have been accused of burning a market and homes at a camp for displaced people.

items.title: Senior Ukraine security figure exposed as Russian 'rat'
items.description: Intelligence chief Vasyl Malyuk was seen personally arresting the suspect, named by media as Dmytro Kozyura.

items.title: Kremlin says Russian citizen released in US after Trump greets freed teacher
items.description: Russia says its citizen will return from the US in the coming days, after Trump hailed the release of American Marc Fogel.

items.title: Crackdown on Bangladesh protesters may be crime against humanity, UN says
items.description: Sheikh Hasina, deposed last year, is accused of putting down protests that left up to 1,400 people dead.
